snippet: Gov. Mark Dayton of Minnesota helped announce a bid for the 2020 College Football Playoff National Championship for the still-incomplete stadium going up in downtown Minneapolis.
abstract: Minneapolis makes bid for 2020 College Football Playoff National Championship game, though new stadium is not yet completed and January game usually takes place in warm-weather cities.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Mark Dayton of Minnesota helped announce a bid for the 2020 College Football Playoff National Championship for the still-incomplete stadium going up in downtown Minneapolis.

headline.main: Minneapolis Bidding for 2020 College Fooball Title Game
